attachments.title: Glass through Glass
attachments.text: This is an experiment made with three wine glasses and Google Glass. By adding different amounts of water to change pitch, I composed a piece while filming it on Glass.
attachments.video_html: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/79510117?autoplay=1" width="400" height="225" frameborder="0" title="Glass through Glass" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>
